visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a line chart with the following specifications: Chart type is line, chart title is 'Monthly Average Rainfall', axes and labels styling includes specific colors and font sizes, data series includes monthly rainfall data, custom colors are provided, and additional configurations include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a line chart with a custom border, title, and axis labels. The chart type is set to 'line', and the title is styled with a specific color and font size. The x-axis categories represent months, and both x and y-axis labels are styled with a defined color and font size. The legend is positioned with a background color and specific alignment settings. The tooltip displays the series name and the corresponding rainfall value in millimeters. The data series includes monthly rainfall data, and a custom color is applied to the series. Additional configurations include a custom color palette and plot options for the line series, such as disabling markers.
